headline: Ok Job
pros: Was not Great, not Terrible, Was OK
cons: Wasn't the worst ever, but wasn't good

headline: Account Manager
cons: Supervisors bad mouthing employees to other co-workers.  Instead of fixing problems they worry more about 'who' made the error and gets the blame.

headline: A strong company but not a good place to work
pros:
Company is strong and profitable.
Centrally located
Company will be around for a long time to come.
A good business concept
cons:
Complete lack of training. This company started out very small and has become a medium sized business that is very successful. However, their internal training, such as it is, has not kept up with its growth. All the training is too informal. It may have worked fine when they were a one-horse operation but not now.

Some of the lower management lack proper people skills.
